conbody.p: You should install the euca2ools repo file on all hosts that will run either Eucalyptus or euca2ools. This repo file provides all the information that the yum command needs to locate and download the euca2ools software. Installing this RPM installs the /etc/yum.repos.d/euca2ools.repo file.

The following command will download and install the correct euca2ools repo file for a CentOS 6.3 host. For more information about installing euca2ools software on other Linux distributions and versions, see the Installation Guide for 3.2 at https://www.eucalyptus.com/docs.
